name: Michael Durham
text: I enjoy racing here. It’s a good place for spectators to come watch. They can pull up and tailgate just outside the fence that surrounds the track and watch the races. I wish I could take off half a star because as a racer the owners tend to play favorites and give special consideration for a select few. As a spectator you won’t have any issues and you will have a blast! Bring the family, bring the kids and make a day of it. It’s still fun to race there and will be going back. I drive a very long way and pass three other tracks to go race there!

name: Shelly Smalley
text: Great place to spend your Saturday nights with family and friends. But, they need more speakers you can't hear anything.

name: Breuanna Gann
text: Absolutely love Thunder Valley. Kid friendly everyone is so nice. Awesome place to take the family ❤

name: Loranda Pruitt
text: Awesome we love it we are really sad that this had to end for this Season but we should return soon asp

name: Larry Townsend (Bill)
text: Great fun some good dirt track racing nice clean fun need to come on out on Saturday evening Thunder Valley speed way an enjoy some great racing gates open at 5PM

name: Steven Lentz
text: Be better if they knew what they were doing half the time.....

name: Cristal Grimes Alexander
text: Go on Saturday nights with my daughter and grandsons and we always have a great time! Great concession stands!

name: James N Pam Price III
text: Awesome  place to enjoy with the family. Great  racing  to watch, loved it

name: Marcella NeSmith
text: Puts on a pretty good show and not to far away

name: Ashleigh Westbrooks
text:
Not enough parking.
People save spaces with chairs so cars cant park if not part of the friend family crew.

name: Pamela Hall Price
text: Great place! Good races

name: Cynthia Gillott
text: Very exciting and enjoyable.Will go again.

name: Randy Frost
text: Good times last night!

name: Carl Nydegger
text: Good racing

name: Stephen Gautreau
text: Great facility. Met Warren, the owner operator. Gave me the grand tour, made me feel comfortable right away. Laid back facility. Decent turnout for a warm and muggy saturday. Looking forward to returning soon.

name: John Van Patten
text: Great practice day. Jesse trying out his new ride. This is NOT a wreck. I repeat... This is NOT a wreck!

name: Robin Westefeld
text: The kids and hubby had a great time. I'd love to see the kids track a little better groomed, but it wasn't bad.

name: James Stamm
text: Pretty awesome, good for beginners or experienced. A little muddy this time but that's just because the rain here has been relentless. Owners nice and seems very knowledgeable.  Me and my buddy had a blast.

name: Kenneth Owens
text: With MX tracks drying up, just happy to have a track close by. Great soil, good berms. Safe jumps.

name: The Rick and James show
text: Great place kid loves riding here

name: Pat Patterson
text: This track is great when prepped and watered properly.

name: Brian G.
text: New design is great

name: Joe Gerard
text: Insanely nice owner. I came here for a track day and the man was very kind, immediately greeting us and then once everyone was there, him and his wife introduced us all to the track and cooked a home cooked meal for us all for lunch, and really love that they made everyone instantly feel like family. Also love the ducks they have there.

name: Pete Panaia
text: I love this place! It just keeps getting better and better! The owner (Ken) is a great guy! The staff there is awesome!

name: Anthony Beasley
text: Absolutely one of the best tracks I've been to. Last weekend every month $150 gets you all day to slide with pride. They also offer bike racing and kart racing.

name: Andrew O.
text:
Follow me on Instagram: a.leestudios

Best track I've been.

Ken is the man.

name: Jay Reed (JargonJC)
text:
A wonderful experience for any Motorhead. The track has several tight turns that will test your car and it does not matter what kind of car you have. I have a Volvo wagon and I kept up with my friend and their Miata.

Every third Sunday of the month is when they have open track days and the cost is $75 for all day access. The owner even cooked us lunch on a grill.

name: cody king
text: Went as just a spectator, pulled my buddies car for him had a blast spite the heat. 10/10 recommend.

name: Elsea’s World
text: I am proud to call Midpond my home track. Ken works extremely hard to keep the landscape perfect and it shows. Track is nice and tight, makes for great drifting!

name: Jeremy Lester
text: Hands down the most inviting atmosphere of any track. Owner in incredibly nice and accommodating. Always making improvements and conscious of making the track safe for drivers and cars. Will definitely be making a trip back down in the future the whole way from PA!

name: David Shaddix
text: Raw, Ridiculous,  Ripping Fun!

name: Edward Lee
text: Awesome race track. Ken, the owner, is awesome. He let us camp anywhere on his racetrack and even let us use his fire pit to cook and keep warm. I'll be back soon for more drift events. Thanks Ken!

name: James Drumheller
text: Love this place

name: Christopher Lovett
text: Awesome place great people awesome staff.

name: Josh Halterman
text: Absolutely fantastic. Great track, tons of seat time, and tons of fun. Ken, the owner, is an awesome guy. Definitely coming back!

name: Cory Grimm
text: This is an oasis in the desert! The only place that runs minimoto for hours. The track surface adds a certain ... challenge to making a fast lap, but Midpond is a great track! The owner is awesome and has a true passion for motorsports. If you get a chance to come to Midpond in a car or on a motorcycle, take it!

name: Jason Dewald
text: Small, tight track. Low fees, maximum seat time, tons of fun!

name: Da Fink
text: Kicking it sideways

name: John Mace
text: Fantastic time and great people!

name: Bud Yeddi
text: I had SO MUCH FUN!! Words cannot describe ❤

name: Louis “ig: Ceo_of_Low” Steverson
text: Great pleace with Great people!

name: Sebastien (350z_zena)
text: Best place to learn how to drift

name: James Drumheller
text: Love this place

name: Michael Upton
text: Had along of fun people really nice

name: Robert Hough
text: Best place to drift in this area.

name: Tyler Durham
text: A great racing experience

name: PHATSAMURAI1
text: Best there is

name: Noah Washington
text: Ok

name: cltcnc
text: Awesome track

name: William Kania
text: Best experience ever

name: Murray Best Sr.
text:
This place is awesome!!!! It has been a long time since I have enjoyed my self this much. THE best racing I've been to. The Best crowd ever. This place is better than Disney Word!!! Not one argument with over 1500 people.
Awesome I'll make the drive from Atlanta from now on. The best vendors ever!!!  People it is worth it.!!!!!

name: Promo Diva Tip
text: Sunday funday chicken  beer edition hosted by Georgia A1 Customs.. Great family friendly environment. Plenty of vendors, music, and good vibes!!!

name: Curtis Williams
text: Had a great time there. It's been years since I had been there.

name: caribbean vibez
text: Great place to see amazing cars nice track I’m definitely come back

name: Charles Bentley
text: Great place to race cars. They keep the track prepped very well. If you are looking for a place to race without dealing with a bunch of headaches this is the place to go.

name: Garry Sutton
text: Fast and good. It was exciting.

name: Robbin Reed
text: This was a 1st for me.  I thoroughly enjoyed myself.

name: Larry Washington
text: Had a blast with my son watching the races. ..had some nice looking and fast cars out there

name: Misty Stone
text:
Need to clean bathrooms and make sure women have tissue paper!
The last few times I have been there has been no tissue and the bathrooms have been nasty....

name: Kenneth Lockhart
text: Another disappointment as was the day before at twiggs. Just another cookout. Plenty of race cars and fans but grudgers taking over. Midwest racing making us look bad. Great comradery just starving for constant side by side racing. Drivers PM your cars before oiling down the track!

name: Eric Eric
text: Great Track

name: Mr.Jay Lawson
text: This is a great place

name: D'WAN HENLEY GodsDesciple
text: It was hooking for me

name: Allen Morris
text: Start racing to later
